column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////I went to Jinya Ramen Bar with my nephew and we both agreed that from the moment we walked in
column2: staff made us feel welcome. Located in Midtown
column3: Jinya is appropriately stylish and we liked the decor
column4: especially the funky light fixtures hanging over the tables. We went on a Sunday about 4 PM
column5: so it was not too crowded and there was parking available in the garage. Not sure if they have enough dedicated spots for a busy lunch or dinner hour
